regulationAuthority.title: Regulation Authority
content: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) oversees the financial markets in the United States and is one of the oldest institutions dedicated to monitoring the activities of financial service providers, banks, and companies that issue securities.
Its main goal is to ensure a functional, reliable, and stable financial system and to protect bank customers, policyholders, and investors.

The SEC is one of the most important governmental regulators in the United States. It is responsible for regulating the securities market, including stock trading, issuance, exchanges, brokers, and the trading operations of individuals and investment companies.

The SEC also oversees mergers and acquisitions of companies. This means that if an asset is traded on U.S. exchanges or is accessible to an American broker, it is automatically subject to the rules established by the SEC.
The primary goal of this organization is to ensure transparency in transactions, combat fraudulent activities, protect investors, and oversee the U.S. stock exchanges.

contact.additionalContactInfo: If you have any further questions regarding Victorum Capital securities, feel free to contact us anytime at +1 604-260-0738 or via email at contact@victorum-capital.com - we look forward to your call!

victorumTrade.title: Victorum Trade
victorumTrade.description1: Victorum Trade is part of the Victorum Group and is the world's leading B2B e-commerce platform, connecting buyers and suppliers worldwide. Victorum Trade focuses not only on China, India, Turkey, and Africa but also on the rapidly growing markets in Belarus, Kazakhstan, Brazil, and Korea. Whether a startup or a global player, the Victorum Trade team supports companies of all sizes, individual entrepreneurs, and individuals.
victorumTrade.description2: Victorum Trade unites more than 350,000 buyers and sellers with over 2.1 million inquiries per year across more than 11 product categories. Buyers and sellers worldwide benefit from over 350,000 registered users and a simple and user-friendly platform for selling goods.

victorumPay.title: VicPay
victorumPay.description1: In a world where security is becoming increasingly important, Victorum Pay offers future-proof and reliable fiat and cryptocurrency payments. Our platform is designed to meet the highest security standards, ensuring that your transactions are safe and protected.
victorumPay.reason1: Victorum Pay stands out as a beacon of trust and innovation in the financial landscape. We offer our customers a simple and intuitive modern alternative to traditional brokers or high street banks. Our services are tailored to meet the diverse needs of businesses and individuals, providing flexibility, speed, and security.
victorumPay.reason2: Future-Proof Payments: Embrace the future of finance with our integrated fiat and cryptocurrency payment solutions. Victorum Pay supports a wide range of digital currencies, ensuring you are always ahead in the rapidly evolving financial ecosystem.
victorumPay.reason3: Reliability: With a strong emphasis on reliability, our platform guarantees smooth and uninterrupted transactions. Whether you are dealing with large-scale business payments or everyday personal transactions, Victorum Pay is your dependable partner.
victorumPay.reason4: User-Friendly Interface: Our platform is designed with the user in mind. Enjoy a seamless experience with our intuitive interface that makes managing your payments effortless.
victorumPay.reason5: Comprehensive Support: We believe in supporting our customers every step of the way. Our dedicated support team is always ready to assist you with any queries or issues you might encounter.

shareSubscription.title: Share Subscription
paragraphs: Subscribing to shares allows investors to become partial owners of a company. This gives them a share in the company's profits and the ability to influence corporate decisions. By subscribing to new shares, investors can support the company's growth while potentially receiving dividends and benefiting from an increase in the stock price.

Share subscription is an important strategy for those looking to diversify their investment portfolio. It offers a mix of income from dividends and capital gains from price increases. It is important to carefully evaluate the company's performance, industry trends, and your financial goals before deciding to subscribe.
Whether you are an experienced investor or new to the market, subscribing to shares can be a valuable addition to your investment strategy and help you build wealth over time.

corporateFinance.title: Corporate Finance
paragraphs: In 2019, transactions worth approximately USD 250 billion between Eastern Europe, Canada, and Germany were not successfully completed due to financing, customs, and logistics issues.
As a result, the companies involved not only lost significant profits but also incurred substantial avoidable costs.

Our local presence, knowledge of national customs and logistics challenges, and our corporate finance solutions ensure that planned lucrative import and export transactions do not become more expensive or delayed. Our experienced staff and the shared network with Victorum Group companies ensure the smooth financing of trade transactions up to USD 250 million.

You will find Victorum Group branches in China, India, Turkey, Nigeria, Namibia, Brazil, as well as countries in Eastern Europe. This allows us to ensure a smooth trading process for goods, products, and raw materials with local staff and excellent contacts.
Are you interested in our Corporate Finance solutions, equity investments, or mezzanine capital?
corporateFinance.contactText: For any inquiries, feel free to contact us at

shareTypeInvestorsContent.title: Share Type & Investors
paragraphs: In this section, you will find all relevant information regarding the securities of Victorum Capital Inc.
The transactions of the securities of Victorum Capital Inc. are subject to different jurisdictions with various regulations and registration processes.

The issuance, registration, and regulation of Victorum Capital Inc.'s securities are carried out in accordance with U.S. securities law in compliance with Rule 506 of Regulation D of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
The sale of securities in Germany is conducted in accordance with the BaFin (Federal Financial Supervisory Authority) directive Art.1 Abs. 4 lit. b) Prospectus-VO of the EU Prospectus Regulation.

All distributions and rights pertaining to the securities are granted exclusively to the buyer of the securities or the person(s) and/or company explicitly designated by the buyer from the moment of transfer.

The parties agree that the ownership of the securities is transferred from the company to the buyer, and that these securities are non-par value Common Restricted Class A Shares with full voting rights and dividend entitlement.

The transfer is carried out electronically under Canadian law through Integral Transfer Agency Shareholder Services Inc., 100 Queen St E, Suite 203, Toronto, ON, M5C 1S6, Canada, Phone: +1 416-623‐8028 / Fax: +1 647-794‐3332, info@integraltransfer.com.

§5 Should the buyer wish to sell the acquired securities before the initial public offering (IPO) of Victorum Capital Inc., the shareholder is required to ensure that the securities are indeed transferred to the acquirer, and thus to the new shareholder, when selling to a third party.

In this case, the buyer must take special care to ensure that any existing voting and dividend rights are also transferred to the acquirer, in accordance with the legal guidelines of the country in which the new buyer is resident.
The buyer is liable to Victorum Capital Inc. and/or the new buyer of the securities for damages incurred due to violations of any of these provisions.
Do you still have questions about your securities? Are there uncertainties or difficulties with correspondence in English?
No problem – we are also available in German daily between 10 AM and 10 PM Berlin time at +1 604-260-0738.
Of course, you can also send your questions to us in writing via email to contact@victorum-capital.com – we look forward to your message!
shareTypeInvestorsContent.additionalContact: For further information, please contact us at
